definition.text: Uruguay is a sovereign presidential republic in South America located between Brazil and Argentina along the Atlantic coast. Historically shaped by livestock-based exports and early welfare-state development, it has evolved into a relatively stable democracy with strong institutions, diversified agricultural exports, growing services sectors, and a high share of renewable energy generation in its electricity matrix.
